text: Kuphela ukufana kwempilo yalomhlaba kunjengamanzi (imvula) esiwehlisela phansi evela esibhakabhakeni emilisa izitshalo zomhlaba abadla kuzona abantu nezinkomo kuze kube yilapho umhlaba uphenduka ohlobisekileyo nobukeka umuhle futhi abantu abahlala kuwona bacabanga ukuthi bona banamandla kuwona, kufike kuwona impoqo yethu ebusuku noma emini, sawenza ukuthi ube ngowezivuno (ukuhamba kwesikhathi) kube sengathi awuzange uchume izolo kanjalo siwachaza ngobunjalo bawo amavesi kubantu abacabangayo
